getApiConfig(){return{authBaseURL:AUTH_API_BASE_URL,hasToken:!!localStorage.getItem('authToken'),environment:process.env.NODE_ENV,isConfigured:!!AUTH_API_BASE_URL};}}// Exportar instancia única del servicio
